about_the_game:
Don’t forget your appointment! With the Modern Hospital tileset for RPG Maker, you’ll get exam rooms, radiology equipment, surgical tools and much more to make a fully-fledged, functioning care center!

The Modern Hospital Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Grass, dirt and concrete
3 patterns of tile floor
Asphalt
Ground stripes
Fence
and more!

Walls:

Plain white walls, stone, metal panels, concrete, several colors and styles of tile (red, green and blue) plus metal, brick and window autotiles!

Also featuring:

White cabinets
Several styles of doors
Office supplies
Waiting room decor – TV, magazines and more
Pediatric decor – cute wall decals and toys
Cleaning equipment – rolling carts, hampers, trash bags, spray bottles, sponges, cloths, mop bucket, etc
Bathroom fixtures
Lab supplies – vials, beakers, microscope, etc
Nursery – baby warmer, cart, blanket, etc
Radiology equipment – scanner, C-arm scanner, CT machine, open MRI machine, ultrasound
Surgery – tables, lighting, scalpels, anesthesia cart, and more
Morgue tiles (tables, drawer, etc)
Exam and patient rooms – wall sockets, beds, gurneys, side tables, privacy curtains, blood pressure machine, oxygen equipment, wheelchairs, IV stands and infuser, medicine cart, walker and more
Chapel
Laundry tiles
Cafeteria setup with buffet serving, preparation station, register, drink station and more
Gym equipment
Pipe and maintenance tiles, valves and switches
Helicopter pad and emergency helicopter
Roof tiles, for smaller clinics
Trees, bushes and landscaping
Signage
plus more!

Events and Animations

Ambulance (marked and unmarked)
5 styles of double doors
Elevator
Red medical helicopter
Valves and switches


UPDATE January 2025:

* Minor art updates, bugfixes


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
